name: Robot Hero - Roguelike Action
description:
Welcome to the magic world of Robot Hero.

The war has begun, all you can do now is to defend yourself against the waves of enemies

Game Features:
• Random and unique skills to help you beat those robots.
• Explore mysterious worlds full of hostile creatures.
• Level-up and equip yourself with powerful weapons to increase your strength.
• Unique Talents: Randomly chosen talents that will give you a permanent boost.
• Easy Control, play the game any time, anywhere.

This game is simple to play and extremely addictive.
